title: Java Level 10 — Mixed Algorithmic Challenges
concept: Harder problems combining arrays, strings, maps, and basic algorithms.

challenges.name: Two Sum Indices
challenges.description: Given n and array, and target S, find any pair of indices i, j (0-based, i<j) such that ai + aj = S. Print i j or -1 if not found.
challenges.input_format: n, array of n integers, then S.
challenges.output_format: Either two integers i j or -1.

challenges.name: Longest Increasing Subsequence Length
challenges.description: Given n and array, compute length of longest strictly increasing subsequence.
challenges.notes: O(n log n) LIS algorithm recommended.

challenges.name: Kadane Maximum Subarray Sum
challenges.description: Compute maximum subarray sum (at least one element).

challenges.name: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
challenges.description: Given string s, find length of longest substring without repeating characters.

challenges.name: Majority Element
challenges.description: Given array where a majority element may or may not exist (appears > n/2 times). Print element if exists else -1.

challenges.name: Merge Intervals
challenges.description: Given n intervals [l, r], merge overlapping intervals and print resulting intervals sorted by l.
challenges.input_format: n, then n lines: l r.
challenges.output_format: k lines of merged intervals: l r.

challenges.name: Meeting Rooms (Minimum Rooms)
challenges.description: Given n meeting intervals [start, end), find minimum number of rooms required so that no meetings in same room overlap.
challenges.input_format: n, then n lines start end.

challenges.name: Shortest Path in Unweighted Graph
challenges.description: Given undirected unweighted graph (n vertices, m edges), and s, t, find length of shortest path (edges count). If no path, print -1.
challenges.input_format: n m, then m lines u v (1-based), then s t.

challenges.name: Number of Islands in Grid
challenges.description: Given n x m grid of '0' and '1', count number of connected components of '1' (4-direction).
challenges.input_format: n m, then n lines each with m characters (0/1).

challenges.name: Dijkstra Single Source Shortest Path
challenges.description: Given weighted directed graph with non-negative weights, compute shortest distance from source s to all vertices and print distance to t (or -1 if unreachable).
challenges.input_format: n m, then m lines: u v w, then s t.
